attributes.action: Extend the Eat Out to Help Out Scheme to September
attributes.additional_details: The government have the power and the responsibility to ensure people are not loosing their jobs due to businesses having a weak financial stability.
attributes.background: Extend the Eat Out to Help Out Scheme to September to give restaurants and cafes financial stability prior to a potential second wave of COVID-19 causing local/national lockdowns.
